action.msg: Give up yet?
Tea, was it? Are you yet charmed by my stunning words?
My... sparkling eyes?
My confident demenour?
The angelic singing voice maybe?
I have yet to have been "charmed" by any of your words.
A-ah, I see-!
You ever even *been* in a relationship before?
Have you?
You sure you're up for this?
HEY- I MEAN
SORTA YEAH.
The fuck does sorta mean?...
WELL I MEAN LIKE-
I AIN'T TRYNA DO ANYTHING WITH HER, Y'KNOW-
I just... want her for myself!
And just what are you gonna do after you steal me away in your "loving" embrace?
Uh- well-?
Maybe we could ... go get chicken sandwiches... y'know, as amigos?
Y'know, usually after going through entire rap battles to fight over a woman, I expect to do a little more than a platonic coffee date.
You gotta pay a little extra.
Like take her to a buffet!
Holy shit, a buffet sounds so fucking good.
Have you ever had carrot cake?
That's a thing?
We need to hurry this up!
CAN WE JUST START THE NEXT SONG ALREADY?
